segments.text: Well , it ’ s really too late . I have to go now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you stay a little longer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I can ’ t.My mother doesn ’ t want me to be late . I really have to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , I won ’ t keep you.Remember to give me a call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your delicious meal .
segments.speaker: S1
